title: How to Get Cut in Pokémon Emerald

steps.title: Go to Rustboro City (the city where the first gym leader, Roxanne is).
steps.content: Go to Rustboro City (the city where the first gym leader, Roxanne is).

steps.title: Go to the house next to the Pokémon Center.
steps.content: Go to the house next to the Pokémon Center.

steps.title: Talk to the man next to the table (the man is the only guy in the house).
steps.content: Talk to the man next to the table (the man is the only guy in the house). The guy you talk to will give you the HM Move Cut.

steps.title: Cut down the little trees in the game using it (cutting the little trees access hidden places and treasures).
steps.content: Cut down the little trees in the game using it (cutting the little trees access hidden places and treasures).
